h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area
h2_title: Take the Sobering Stone to the Yellow-Robed Squire
content: Once you have the Sobering Stone, bring it back to the Yellow-Robed Squire in Rockrest Flat. Once you've given the boar the stone, he'll move on to the Crouching Tiger Temple.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_2_Secret_Area.md", within the section "How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area" and the sub-section "Take the Sobering Stone to the Yellow-Robed Squire". The content is presented below:

Once you have the Sobering Stone, bring it back to the Yellow-Robed Squire in Rockrest Flat. Once you've given the boar the stone, he'll move on to the Crouching Tiger Temple.
